sentences.english: March breeze, tempting lazy, elegant light and agile.
sentences.chinese: 三月的微风，缱绻慵懒，飘逸轻灵。

sentences.english: Forgot upon your dearest love to call.
sentences.chinese: 说我忘记向你缱绻的爱慰问。

sentences.english: Romantic piano finish, without the slightest impurities, pure.
sentences.chinese: 琴声缱绻悠长，没有一丝杂质，纯净如初。

sentences.english: She still ached for the lost intimacy and sexual contact of marriage.
sentences.chinese: 她仍旧渴望拥有婚姻中逝去的那份缱绻和肌肤之亲。

sentences.english: Fetishism, love mountain and water, miss bigalopolis.
sentences.chinese: 拜物，恋山水，缱绻大都会。

sentences.english: Or as your tear drop while deeply attached, dripping on my cheek, startling my soul, touching my heart .
sentences.chinese: 或如缱绻时你的那颗泪，滴在我的脸颊，动魄惊心。

sentences.english: Why love be space and into one, long night, only lingering.
sentences.chinese: 为什么爱被空间撒成一片，漫漫永夜，只有缱绻。

definition: (of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
whispering in a low voice (idiom); murmuring
to miss/to long for/to remember with longing/yearning
from dawn to dusk/all the time
